channel.title: Would this be a good update to my server?
channel.description:
Alright so the main question is: [size=12pt]Would this be a Good Update to my server?[/size] My name is Questmaster 2k10, and I currently run a 508 server. I was planning to add a special content-update for the first update of the New Year. This update is more of a skill-related feature that would require certain levels to be achieved.
I have a very Accurate Event Manager that keeps track of time very smooth-like. The Update I was planning to add is an [b]Agility-Related Update for the Player's Run Energy System[/b], which if the player has a certain Agility-level, the amount of run energy left in the bar would decrease 2x slower, making a player's stamina last much longer.
The Decreased Amount of Run Energy in the bar will be based on [b]3-Divisions[/b] of timing.
[list][b]Divisions[/b]:
[ul][li]1. At Agility level 30, the amount of run energy will be decreased 2x slower.[/li]
[li]2. At Agility level 60, the amount of run energy will be decreased 3x slower.[/li]
[li]3. At Agility level 90, the amount of run energy will be decreased 4x slower.[/li]
[li]4. If a player takes an Agility Potion (4), and some other agility substances that increases your Agilitie's Level temporarily, the amount of run energy will be decreased 5x slower, as a Christmas/New Year gift, and even though the agility level is only temporary through potions, the decrease rate will be permanet! [/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b]I wanted the people of moparscape's opinions on weather I should add this update?[/b] I'm compatible to add it myself so I won't need any assistance but I wanted your ideas on wheather this would be a good update. I have 200 players daily, and I don't want to add something i'll regret that'll effect the entire server.
[b][i]The first person to post something positive about this thread will be repped++[/b]

item.title: Would this be a good update to my server?
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:3, topic:376317”]yes i see some good in it

it would be awesome
can you make a tut about it (or snippet) when done?[/quote]

I don’t think I will, for almost 4 years now i’ve been running the same server, and ever since the start all content of/relating to the server has NEVER been released.

Read full topic

item.title: Would this be a good update to my server?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Why not just add their current agility level onto the run energy?
Example
Lvl 1 agility = 100% run
Lvl 2 agility = 102% run (initial jump)
Lvl 3 agility = 103 % run
Lvl 50 agility = 150% run
Lvl 99 agility + agility cape on = 200% run energy

Read full topic
item.source: Would this be a good update to my server?

item.title: Would this be a good update to my server?
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Alright so the main question is: [size=12pt]Would this be a Good Update to my server?[/size] My name is Questmaster 2k10, and I currently run a 508 server. I was planning to add a special content-update for the first update of the New Year. This update is more of a skill-related feature that would require certain levels to be achieved.

I have a very Accurate Event Manager that keeps track of time very smooth-like. The Update I was planning to add is an Agility-Related Update for the Player’s Run Energy System, which if the player has a certain Agility-level, the amount of run energy left in the bar would decrease 2x slower, making a player’s stamina last much longer.

The Decreased Amount of Run Energy in the bar will be based on 3-Divisions of timing.

[list]Divisions:

[ul][li]1. At Agility level 30, the amount of run energy will be decreased 2x slower.[/li]

[li]2. At Agility level 60, the amount of run energy will be decreased 3x slower.[/li]

[li]3. At Agility level 90, the amount of run energy will be decreased 4x slower.[/li]

[li]4. If a player takes an Agility Potion (4), and some other agility substances that increases your Agilitie’s Level temporarily,
the amount of run energy will be decreased 5x slower, as a Christmas/New Year gift, and even though the agility level is only temporary through potions, the decrease rate will be permanet! [/li][/ul]

[hr]

I wanted the people of moparscape’s opinions on weather I should add this update? I’m compatible to add it myself so I won’t need any assistance but I wanted your ideas on wheather this would be a good update. I have 200 players daily, and I don’t want to add something i’ll regret that’ll effect the entire server.

[i]The first person to post something positive about this thread will be repped++
